overview: Jack's father lowers the boom when his irresponsible rich-kid ends up in jail after a night of debauchery. The father appoints Ossie, Jack's cousin, as guardian, not realizing that Ossie is just as bad. They set off on a transcontinental trip with mischief on their minds.
tagline: When he opens his eyes he looks for girls! When he opens his mouth...you'll look for laughs...and get plenty!
title: Broadminded
